an5.234:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu avasassa bahupakaro hoti.
an5.234:1.6: maha kho pana bhikkhusangho abhikkanto nanaverajjaka bhikkhu gihinam upasankamitva aroceti:
an5.234:1.7: ‘maha kho, avuso, bhikkhusangho abhikkanto nanaverajjaka bhikkhu, karotha punnani, samayo punnani katun’ti;
an5.234:1.8: catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an5.234:1.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato avasiko bhikkhu avasassa bahupakaro hoti”ti.
